Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-24)M(1-18) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-24)+melittin(1-18), UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (71.05%) toCecropin AI=K=G: 13%; L: 17%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli K12 (LC 0.7 uM), P. aeruginosa (LC 8 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.7 uM), S. aureus Cowan I (LC 10 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 1 uM).In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >200 uM). cf. melittin LC 4-8 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Boman HG, Wade D, Boman IA, WÃ¥hlin B, Merrifield RB.1989
Literature Information.Title: Antibacterial and antimalarial properties of peptides that are cecropin-melittin hybrids
